author: SAM McNEIL Associated Press
title: Wuhan embraces Yangtze River as virus-hit city reopens
description: The reopening of ferry services on the Yangtze River was an important symbolic step to get business and daily life back to normal in the city where the coronavirus pandemic began
content:
WUHAN, China -- 
Bathed in golden late-afternoon light, Chen Enting snapped a photo of his ticket to commemorate his first ferry ride across the Yangtze River after a 76-day quarantine ended in the Chinese city where the coronavirus pandemic began.
